General.Name: Care Token
General.Description:
CareX is a healthcare payment method that allows patients to control their health records and purchase healthcare services at a reduced cost, regardless of borders. The CareX system allows providers to cut their administrative costs, get paid instantly and acces a global market of customers.

CARE Token holders are able to utilize the CareX wallet to securely host their medical records, granting short-term access to providers as needed and decided. Preliminary unofficial diagnoses to ailments will also be available thanks to our medically trained AI-based chatbot.

ICO.Description:
CareX is a healthcare payment method that allows patients to control their health records and purchase healthcare services at a reduced cost, regardless of borders. The CareX system allows providers to cut their administrative costs, get paid instantly and acces a global market of customers.

CARE Token holders are able to utilize the CareX wallet to securely host their medical records, granting short-term access to providers as needed and decided. Preliminary unofficial diagnoses to ailments will also be available thanks to our medically trained AI-based chatbot.

Team:

  • Mike Bishop: Chief Executive Officer, Head of CareX ICO,Compliance Officer 
  • Hendrik Klein: Chief Investment Officer, CEO at Da Vinci Luxury AG; Zürich Area, Switzerland 
  • Jackson Adams: Chief Communications Officer(CCO) 
  • Daniel Pivalizza: Crypto Analyst 

The CareX ICO began on the 11th of December 2017 and will end on the 23rd of March 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 100% of the total token supply and will be available for a 10 USD starting price. The ICO funding target is set at $20,000,000 and the cap is set at $100,000,000. 

The CARE ICO features a bounty campaign and escrow agent.
